General.Name: Highgold Mining Inc
General.Description: HighGold Mining Inc. operates as a gold exploration company in North America. The company's flagship asset is the Johnson Tract gold property covering an area of 21,000 acres located in Southcentral Alaska, the United States. It also explores for copper, zinc, silver, and lead. The company was incorporated in 2019 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 800 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 2V6
